Ltd.","details":"VERSION: 1.3         DATE:    2020-12-09","methods":{"addSavingsContract(address,address)":{"details":"Adds a new savings contract","params":{"_mIx":"Address of underlying mIx","_savingsContract":"Address of the savings contract"}},"collectAndDistributeInterest(address)":{"details":"Collects interest from a target mIx and distributes to the SavingsContract.     Applies constraints such that the max APY since the last fee collection cannot     exceed the \"MAX_APY\" variable.","params":{"_mIx":"mIx for which the interest should be collected"}},"collectAndStreamInterest(address)":{"details":"Collects the platform interest from a given mIx and then adds capital to the stream. If there is > 24h left in current stream, just top it up, otherwise reset.","params":{"_mIx":"The mIx to fetch interest"}},"depositLiquidation(address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows the liquidator to deposit proceeds from iquidated gov tokens. Transfers proceeds on a second by second basis to the Savings Contract over 1 week.","params":{"_liquidated":"Units of mIx to distribute","_mIx":"The mIx to transfer and distribute"}},"distributeUnallocatedInterest(address)":{"details":"Redistributes the unallocated interest to the saved recipient, allowing the siphoned assets to be used elsewhere in the system","params":{"_mIx":"mIx to collect"}},"freezeStreams()":{"details":"Freezes streaming of mIxs"},"pause()":{"details":"Called by the Governor to pause, triggers stopped state."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.","return":"Returns `true` when paused, otherwise `false`"},"setRevenueRecipient(address,address)":{"details":"Sets the revenue recipient address","params":{"_mIx":"Address of underlying mIx","_recipient":"Address of the recipient"}},"setSavingsRate(uint256)":{"details":"Sets a new savings rate for interest distribution","params":{"_savingsRate":"Rate of savings sent to SavingsContract (100% = 1e18)"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Called by Governor to unpause, returns to normal state."},"updateSavingsContract(address,address)":{"details":"Updates an existing savings contract","params":{"_mIx":"Address of underlying mIx","_savingsContract":"Address of the savings contract"}}},"title":"SavingsManager"},"userdoc":{"methods":{},"notice":"Savings Manager collects collectAndDistributeInterest(address).details: Collects interest from a target mIx and distributes to the SavingsContract.     Applies constraints such that the max APY since the last fee collection cannot     exceed the "MAX_APY" variable.

params._mIx: mIx for which the interest should be collected

collectAndStreamInterest(address).details: Collects the platform interest from a given mIx and then adds capital to the stream. If there is > 24h left in current stream, just top it up, otherwise reset.

depositLiquidation(address,uint256).details: Allows the liquidator to deposit proceeds from iquidated gov tokens. Transfers proceeds on a second by second basis to the Savings Contract over 1 week.

params._mIx: The mIx to transfer and distribute

distributeUnallocatedInterest(address).details: Redistributes the unallocated interest to the saved recipient, allowing the siphoned assets to be used elsewhere in the system

pause().details: Called by the Governor to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setSavingsRate(uint256).details: Sets a new savings rate for interest distribution

params._savingsRate: Rate of savings sent to SavingsContract (100% = 1e18)

unpause().details: Called by Governor to unpause, returns to normal state.

userdoc.notice: Savings Manager collects interest from mIxs and sends them to the         corresponding Savings Contract, performing some validation in the process.
